title: the install stucks
body:
HI

I must unistall my leageu because it won't open. now i got a problem that the install won't finish it is downloading and it stucks at 230mb to go.
The % goes up till 99% but the KBS is evrytime 0 and its still 230mb

PLZ HELP ME 

My English isn't very well. {{champion:64}} 

Already thank you  if you can help me

replies.body:
What operating system and internet service provider are you using?

Have you tried running the installer in admin mode?
